name: Share this link should be readable in Invite Members dialog

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Thursday, October 01, 2020 4:10 PM
• Set back to Active for manual testing

inline.description:
Share this link should be readable in Invite Members dialog
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open Invite People and then click on Invite Members.
  2. When the focus is on Share this link, the JAWS reader should read out the text "Team invite link" following by the actual link.
inline.expectedResult: • Share this link should read out the text "Team invite link" following by the actual link.

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Guest Accounts: Share this link input field has no context — MM-17535
